title: Deutsche Bank publishes Environmental and Social Policy Framework
body:
With this publication the bank aims to improve the transparency on its Environmental and Social risk approach for investors, rating agencies and NGOs.
The 
PDF
document reflects the current status how the bank presently encounters challenges relating to the due diligence of its global activities in respect of potential environmental and social impacts. The bank works on evolving enhancements of the framework to supplement new topics. In this process the bank values a constructive dialogue with its different stakeholders.
Please address your comments and suggestions to mailbox.sustainability@db.com.
